name: contact-form-lambda
description: AWS Lambda functions for contact form

scripts.package-contact: npm install && cd .. && zip -r lambda/contact-function.zip lambda/contact-handler.js lambda/package.json lambda/node_modules -x '*.git*' 'lambda/node_modules/@types/*'
scripts.package-test: npm install && cd .. && zip -r lambda/test-function.zip lambda/test-handler.js lambda/package.json lambda/node_modules -x '*.git*' 'lambda/node_modules/@types/*'
